The inactivation of the hospital in Ituzaingo reminds us of the sad history of Warnes ...
The Warnes was a children's hospital that began to be built in 1951 under the presidency of Perón, it was to be a model in Latin America.
When Perón was overthrown in 55, 11 months were left to complete its construction ...
The de facto government abandoned the work and was demolished in 1991 by an implosion. #noqueremosunwarnesenituzaingo
